actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit and a single six-year term for the President.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares an age limit of 70 years for election to the office of President or Vice President. Declares that the term of office of the President and Vice President shall be six years, and that no person shall be elected to the office of President more than once.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide an age limit and a single six-year term for the President.
